item.title: [PI]Adding A Timer To Playersave Class[PI]

item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I added these to my playersave:

} else if (token.equals("rTimer")) { p.rTimer = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("rTimer = ", 0, 10); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.rTimer), 0, Integer.toString(p.rTimer).length()); characterfile.newLine();

And I got an exception while running the server and people lost their account filesâ€¦
